header: The Lordâ€™s People Will Come Home

verse: The Lord will have mercy on Israel and will let them be his chosen people once again. He will bring them back to their own land, and foreigners will join them as part of Israel.
Other nations will lead them home, and Israel will make slaves of them in the land that belongs to the Lord. Israel will rule over those who once governed and mistreated them.

header: Death to the King of Babylonia!

verse: The Lord will set you free from your sorrow, suffering, and slavery.
Then you will make fun of the King of Babylonia by singing this song:
The Lord All-Powerful has promised to attack Babylonia and destroy everyone there, so that none of them will ever be remembered again.
The Lord will sweep out the people, and the land will become a swamp for wild animals.
